androidx.car.widget

Class ListItemAdapter.BackgroundStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.car.widget.ListItemAdapter.BackgroundStyle
  • Enclosing class:
    ListItemAdapter

    public static final class ListItemAdapter.BackgroundStyle
extends java.lang.Object
    Constant class for background style of items.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CARD
      Sets each item in CardView with a rounded corner background and shadow.
      static int NONE
      Sets the background color of each item to none (transparent).
      static int PANEL
      Sets background of each item so the combined list looks like one elongated card, namely top and bottom item will have rounded corner at only top/bottom side respectively.
      static int SOLID
      Sets the background color of each item.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • SOLID

        public static final int SOLID
        Sets the background color of each item. Background can be configured by R.styleable#ListItem_listItemBackgroundColor.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NONE

        public static final int NONE
        Sets the background color of each item to none (transparent).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CARD

        public static final int CARD
        Sets each item in CardView with a rounded corner background and shadow.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PANEL

        public static final int PANEL
        Sets background of each item so the combined list looks like one elongated card, namely top and bottom item will have rounded corner at only top/bottom side respectively. If only one item exists, it will have both top and bottom rounded corner.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
